C

com.btmatthews.utils.monitor - package com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This package contains the classes that implement a simple monitor for controlling server processes.

Create a server object.

Logger - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
Implemented by objects that write error and information messages to log files.
logInfo(String) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger

M

Monitor - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
The monitor object is used to control a server.
Monitor(String, int) - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
The constructor that initialises the monitor key and port.

R

runMonitor(Server, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Run the monitor listening for commands and sending them to the server.

S

sendCommand(String, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Monitor
Send a command to the monitor.
Server - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This interface is implemented by server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
ServerFactory - Interface in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This interface is implemented by factories that create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
ServerFactoryLocator - Class in com.btmatthews.utils.monitor
This locator object is a singleton that is used to obtain the factory that will be used to create server objects that can be controlled by a monitor.
start(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
Start the server.
stop(Logger) - Method in interface com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Server
Stop the server.
